name: The Favourite (Task)
description:
A popular app for direct payments between people is growing.


When looking at their data, they realise that a majority of their users with 10 or more transfers have less than 5 different recipients they transfer money to.


Because of this, they decide to add a feature allowing a user to save a recipient as a favourite for quicker access in future sessions, saving them the trouble of scanning through their contact list.
